Title: Prohibits the sale of any vapor or tobacco products containing the substance ethyl menthane carboxamide
Summary: Prohibits the sale of any vapor or tobacco products containing the substance N-Ethyl-p-menthane-3-carboxamide, which creates a cooling sensation similar to menthol.
LawCode: Amd ยง1399-mm-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of any vapor or tobacco products containing the substance N-Ethyl-p-menthane-3-carboxamide
